    • getReleaseStatistics

      public GetReleaseStatisticsResponse getReleaseStatistics(@NonNull GetReleaseStatisticsRequest request)
      Gets the sales statistics for a release. Note: Authentication is optional. Authenticated users will have the currency expressed by their configured preference. Unauthenticated users will have prices reflected in Currency.USD.
      Parameters:
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the response
      See Also:
